entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
